settings-firstreview-stepone: Step 1 of 4: Download customer import template **
settings-firstreview-afterdownload: After you download, add the following for each customer: **
settings-firstreview-companyname: Company Name (Optional) - Company the contractor works for. It is OK to associate multiple contractors with the same company. **
settings-firstreview-companynumber: Company Number (Optional) - Typically the landline number of the company. It is OK to leave this blank. **
settings-firstreview-accountnumber: Company Account Number (Optional) - An identifier used within your company to refer to this customer account. **
settings-firstreview-firstname: First Name (Required) - First name of contractor. **
settings-firstreview-lastname: Last Name (Optional) - Last name of contractor. **
settings-firstreview-cellnumber: Cell Number (Required) - Cell number of contractor. **
settings-firstreview-accountrep: Account Rep (Optional) - Type the username (email address) of the Prokeep user who is responsible for the contractor. **
settings-firstreview-prioritizerep: Prioritize Account Rep (Optional) - Please mark an X if the Account Rep should receive the contractor's incoming messages before the Shared Inbox. **
settings-firstreview-markx: Please mark an X under the group that the contact is associated with. **
settings-firstreview-afterfinishadding: After you finish adding customers, save and close the template and continue to the next step. **
settings-customerimport-selecttemplate: Select the template where you added customer information. **
settings-withcustomerimportlayout-missin: The selected file is missing the column: []  **
The selected file is missing the columns: []  **
settings-withcustomerimportlayout-notaut: You are not authorized to add contacts to the group: [] **
You are not authorized to add contacts to the groups: [] **
You are not authorized to alter data for the columns: [] **
You are not authorized to alter data for the column: [] **
settings-columnsreview-checkexamplevalue: Check that the Example Values from your template match the Column Header. If they do not match, cancel the import process and return to the template and ensure column values match the column header. **
settings-finalreview-pleaseconfirm: Please confirm import by pressing Continue below. **
settings-finalreview-prokeepimportnewcus: Prokeep will then import all new customers. If there are rows with errors, you can either Cancel Import, address the rows with errors, and restart the process OR you can press Continue and import all rows that do not report an error. **
settings-finalmessage-importedcustomersa: We imported no customers and skipped none because of errors. **
settings-finalmessage-importedonecustome: We imported 1 customer and skipped none because of errors. **
settings-finalreview-importingnow: We are importing your customers now. This process may take a few minutes. The screen will refresh when the process is complete. **
settings-withfinalreviewlayout-unabletoi: Unable to import customers at this time, please try again later. **
settings-withcustomerimportlayout-notval: The selected file is not valid. **

settings-holidayhours-norecords: No records are currently being created **
settings-afterhoursdashboard-createmessa: Create a message to let customers know they have reached you outside business hours **

settings-addedithours-placeholdermessage: You have reached us outside of temporary business hours. Our temporary hours are 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. **
settings-addedithours-unavailable: Uncheck if unavailable for the selected date. **
settings-addeditholidayhours-startdate: Start date cannot be after end date **
settings-addeditholidayhours-enddate: End date cannot be before start date **
settings-addeditholidayhours-openhour: Open hour should be lower than close hour **

settings-addoreditholidayhours-overlap: Overlap an existing set of Temporary Hours. **

settings-sharingsettings-allowmessages: Allow messages to be shared between groups and individuals after a specified amount of time. **
settings-sharingsettingsform-definedefau: Define the default length of time a message can be unclaimed before being shared to additional groups. **
settings-support-typefeedback: Type your feedback here and press Submit when you are done. Your input helps us build a better product. **
settings-announcementgroup-selectgroupin: Select which group inbox you want to receive announcement replies **
